title: Message to President Paul von Hindenburg of Germany on the Sinking of the Niobe.
text:
THE AMERICAN people join me in expressing to you and through you to the German people deepest sympathy in the loss occasioned Germany by the tragic sinking of the training ship Niobe.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Field Marshal Paul von Beneckendorff und von Hindenburg, President of the Reich, Berlin, Germany]
